Minimal shedding Review Title: Great product Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Brazilian Deep Wave Bundles with Closure(10/10/10/10+10Inch), 8A Brazilian Hair Bundles Deep Curly Weave, 100% Unprocessed Human Hair Extensions Bundles with Closure 4x4 Free Part Natural Black Review Date: 2019/11/15 Store: kiss love Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kiss love', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Weave', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6.75 x 2 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '680465235904'} Review Text: Love this hair! Minimal shedding Review Title: Great product Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Coisini Hair 130% Density Human Hair Wigs With Free Part Bangs Brazilian Body Wave Wig 12 Inch Glueless Machine Made Wigs For Woman 100% Unprocessed Natural Color Review Date: 2021/10/19 Store: Coisini Average Rating: 2.7 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'Coisini', 'Package Dimensions': '11.81 x 6.85 x 2.72 inches; 10.55 Ounces', 'UPC': '632313674595'} Review Text: Ok, let's start with the fact that it was a day late (no big deal).
It came in a really nice package, but the pattern was a little off. Nothing that a bit of water and finger combing didn't solve though...
With the price of the wig, I was a little hesitant that it wasn't human hair. However, I bumped it to add a little more bounce. Held a curl all day and was very light. I love this and will order another unit soon. Review Title: Love this hair... With the price of the wig, I was a little hesitant that it wasn't human hair. However, I bumped it to add a little more bounce. Held a curl all day and was very light. raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
This shopper demonstrates a strong preference for high-quality human hair products, particularly in wavy and curly textures, indicating an appreciation for natural aesthetics. Consistent positive sentiments are observed for products such as Brazilian deep wave bundles, with minimal shedding and effective styling being highlighted in favorable reviews. However, their experience with wigs reveals a mixed sentiment, as a product was rated lower despite positive feedback on its lightness and styling capability, indicating an initial hesitation about quality for price.

Moreover, their engagement with different brands suggests a willingness to experiment within the realm of human hair products, although they express price sensitivity, likely favoring budget-friendly options while maintaining quality. The dissatisfaction with the edge styling scarf, which was described as poorly fitting, reflects a desire for well-structured accessories that align with their styling needs.

Overall, this consumer values quality, flexibility in styling, and affordability, while also showing a need for reliable product functionality in hair accessories. Their purchasing decisions are primarily driven by positive past experiences and a quest for effective styling solutions without compromising on quality.

target_interaction.title_meta: Ali Pearl Silky Edge Styling Scarf Frontal Headband & Edge Brush for Baby Hair & Soft Tape Measure & Cute Makeup Bag Set to Make Perfect Edges (Pink Gift Bag)
features: 1.Pay 1 Get 4: A Pink Edge Laying headband, A hair edge brush, A mini tape measure in random color and A storage makeup bag.4 Useful items to help slay perfect edges.

2.Pink Silky Satin Headband: Can keep your hair in place easily when you install wigs, make baby hair, pluck hair line, do sport or yoga or makeup. Enough length and width suitable for all head circumstance. Easy to care and wash.
3.Useful Hair Edge Brush: Double side edge brush and comb is a edge styling tool designed for all hair styles, helping smooth the edges, clean the hair,fix the baby hair.

4.Soft mini tape measure: Flexible and portable plastic tap measure, measuring range 60 inches/150 cm. Suitable for measuring curved or flat surfaces like head circumference, sewing, tailoring. Large and clear marking make it easy to read and use.
5.Cute pony makeup bag: You can put your headband, edge brush, tap measure or other items in this utility and water-resisting bag. It can also be used as a coin purse or makeup bag.
